## OpusAudioCodec type

Configuration to use the Opus audio codec.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OpusAudioCodec = {
    [Constants.AudioCodecKeyType]: AudioCodecType.Opus;
    [Constants.AudioCodecOpusKeyMaxAverageBitrate]?: number;
};
```
